data.message: wth is with the post making me think my friend is dead and it was on my page toO ? I did a screen snip now its gone and I can't post it here

replies.message: this freaked me out about my friend I started crying then saw it on my page now they are both removed I didn't X them out . I started crying n

Hi Maggie. For a brief period today, a message meant for memorialized profiles was mistakenly posted to other accounts. This was a terrible error that we have now fixed and worked quickly to resolve. Thanks for taking the time to report the issues and hope that no one was too affected by the problem! -Jessica

I felt so awful my heart dropped I started crying , I'm in the u.s. my friend is in Ireland , I was posting on her page I thought I lost her , I' still so upset ,I went to my page to go thru my messages to get her daughters phone numbers and saw it on my page if I hadn't seen that I would have been way more traumatized but still for that time it hurt me so bad  then thank God I messaged and she was there if it hadn't been on both her and my page I would have lost it we both lost ours sisters and we are very close , I thank you for responding but think if you had been in my place to find out that way and being 6 hours apart in time . whew then we joked some about it , like at least we went together who shall we haunt . and I just had a death in the family . 
well at least I won't stress over the little things today like I have to give my dog another flea bath and and etc . 
again thank you for taking the time to respond and thankful that the screw up was on both our pages  . how strange . okay I thought I'm dead too and hey there is beer in heavebn .. . anyway still a bit in shock but we are alive so have to say thank god for that

thank God I saw it before my Parents did , they are in their late 80"s Daddeo is 88 my Mommie is 86 and recently lost her Brother and recovered from having  a hole in her aorta if she has seen it first after us losing the oldest of 5 children to septicemia after a bad case of pneumonia  , this is no joke , just saying oops isn't cool , i hate to go over board but we are all in bad situations financially I can't even afford to go up north to see them or go to my uncles funereal  seems like you should be or feel obligated to make some gesture , my husband has to go through lung cancer screening  he already is housebound on oxygen and missing one foot all this trauma and then this on top  . I just now after all these hours am kind of thinking straight , so I want to see my family up North or my friend in Ireland or a television we can actually see we have old fat back t.v that you can barely see and a very small flat screen , you may thinks what happened is no big deal , but I'm sure you can see my page and if you could the message I sent . I lost it for awhile this isn't the kind of thing that is oh oops something went wrong I really thought my friend had died . that was so cruel

I can't work my back is shot , live off my husbands pension I have to much trauma in my life to go thru what I did this afternoon , can't fix my oven my vacuum or my t.v I do appreciate Facebook that allows me to see people I can't afford to go see in person , yes people will think I am over reacting but you have no idea that for the time I thought my friend was dead what I went thru . I just now after taking medication calmed down .  I would have sent this another way but there wasn't another way
